lead_paragraph: FRANK--Beatrice. Members of The Walking Group and its friends are sad of the loss of Bea Frank, the beloved wife of Lloyd Frank, our charter member. We have all spent many wonderful years together and will so miss Bea. With our love and great sadness, Mark, Derek, Mickey, Anita, Masako and Hazel. 1/3
